html:
10.22.18  7:18 pm   cant help noticing how good your typography is, completely insane. ive tried doing it a few times, but the results were nothing like yours. what would you recommend to help it stand out?

     you just have to develop a personal relationship with the playing field .... wait i'm actually not entirely sure what typography means

10.22.18  5:22 pm   Do you have any hobbies outside of writing music?

     bringing it into reality by recording it, and maybe even adding a visual experience to go along with it

10.22.18  4:39 pm   Are you following a purpose and believe in higher ones compared to others? 

     everything is purpose. we are swimming in purpose, and it is not clear which direction is up

10.22.18  2:45 pm   how do I stop myself feeling jealous of people that make better content than me? 

      think about how jealous they might feel of other people

10.22.18  12:39 pm   Do you judge people for putting ads on their videos?

     no

     Do you think they should do it?

     it depends what kind of results they want

10.22.18  11:44 am   You went to writing-lyrics-about-going-home  rehab a while back, but maybe fell off the wagon for When I Get Older. Any plans for more rehab, or just accepting the things you cannot change?
(plz accept, it's so relatable and good) 

     one of the endings to this one had 'home' at the end but i used a different ending instead

10.22.18  11:37 am   is there ever gonna be more merch cause i think there is hella potential cause your videos are so A E S T H E T I C

     i think i'm going to actually do more videos instead

10.22.18  11:36 am   Can you tell us one of your most recent shower thoughts? 

      the first line of the song

10.22.18  11:07 am   Whats the hardest instrument to sight read on?

     trombone because the trombone gets in the way of the page

10.22.18  10:49 am   what other careers/professions are you interested in?

      job creator

10.22.18  10:38 am   pls consume water!

     that's an interesting idea

10.22.18  10:26 am   You know how you always never tell us what the name of the next song in its entirety until the whole song is released? How about changing that up and just telling it to us? Gotta see if that works better or worse than not telling us.

     actually i quite frequently reveal the entire title of an upcoming project very early on

10.22.18  10:22 am   Whenever I tell people I wanna be able to improvise, they tell me to use the circle of fifths. Could you explain why it is useful?

     i'm not sure if that advice quite makes sense

10.22.18  10:20 am   Is there any instrument you don't yet play that you'd like to learn how to?

     camera drones?

10.22.18  10:17 am   What is the longest walk (time or distance) that you've done?

     8 hours and then 8 hours the next day also

10.22.18  8:24 am   Bill, what's your approach to songwriting? My family listens to your music a lot, and I was wondering how you make it so good :) 

      you are very kind but i'm not quite sure how it happens really

10.22.18  8:11 am   what are your thoughts on practising with a metronome?

     seems legit

10.22.18  6:34 am   Are preparing / at least thinking about going on a tour ?

     yes

10.22.18  4:49 am   show us a clip of a reality vid you made today, as a spoiler for passionate fans

     ok

10.22.18  4:27 am   Hı bill,i'm a piano player, i started making music when i was 15 years old and i've been in love with it ever since. Now i'm 18 and i gotta decide what my next move will be. I would really love music as a career but i'm on the fence, i have some doubts. I want to either make music as my career or computer science. My family and friends mostly support the computer science, because pay is better and there are more job opportunities but even though computer science is enjoyable, music is like enjoyable x100. Do i have to go to music school? I mean i have a lots of gaps in my knowledge and i need to fill that. Or i might somehow make two of the choices work at the same time. Did you go to music school? How's the pay for a musician new in the scene? I love playing to a crowd and seeing them enjoy my performance that's one of the many ways of music i love

     there are many many ways to make a living playing music, and they all may require you to do different things. and they are all a very unpredictable path. it's not like medical school where you just follow orders for 10 years and then you get the trophy ... music is a much more weird and wild career path ...... and many people embark on it and don't find any career at all. it's kind of like magic ...... but if you are crazy enough it should be just fine

10.22.18  1:22 am   what's your favourite thing about airplanes?

     the wings

10.22.18  1:08 am   im gay. people now know. do people dislike this

     no

10.22.18  12:50 am   Any songs that you've made you're not proud of? Like you wish could've (or can) be better?

     oh nice try, then everyone is gonna go listen to it and see how bad it is

10.22.18  12:05 am   thanks Bill, how do I find the sqr root in my head?

     you have to go to the nearest square numbers on either side, then just assume that the square root of your number is somewhere in between. like the square root of 60 .... 60 is between 49 and 64 so that means the square root of 60 is almost 8. i just remembered drake used this method in a lyric

10.22.18  12:00 am   Are you ever going to wrote in this site's notebook again?

     i never wrote directly in it. i have only posted things there that were written elsewhere, and i will continue to do that

10.21.18  10:47 pm   Hi about the 'pop music is the classical music of now' thing.. I agree with the point that I think paul was making, that popular music isn't for whatever reason less valid or has less artist merit than the "high class stuff"... but was classical music actually popular in its time? Like didn't mozart and beethoven and all those guys mostly perform for royalty and stuff? And you had to be really rich to go see an orchestra or an opera or whatever, and there wasn't any recorded music or radio or anything.... Wouldn't popular music at that time have been the music people made themselves, like traditional folk songs and church hymns and stuff??

     yes

10.21.18  10:23 pm   Hey Bill, do you think you'll ever do any interviews or videos about yourself in a more relatable or narrative context? I find what you make very enjoyable and I'm really curious to know who you are, what inspires you, and what your art means in to you. 

     i feel like i've explained that stuff here, over and over again

10.21.18  10:05 pm   will you ever make good videos again? it seems like you died in March.

     oh that's very kind of you

10.21.18  9:45 pm   what's your hair color?

     i don't care

10.21.18  9:39 pm   are there any subliminal messages in your songs?

     maybe sometimes

      if I play them backwards or slowed down, will I uncover hidden lore?

     no way, that's a lame way to put subliminal messages

10.21.18  8:26 pm   I don't like school because it's boring. How do I make it less boring?

     do other things mentally, during it

10.21.18  8:23 pm   Some People categorize your songs as christon rock. Do you think that your songs are Christian rock?

     no

10.21.18  8:22 pm   why do you use a baritone uke instead of an acoustic guitar?

     guitar has too many strings for me

10.21.18  8:11 pm   Bill when get stressed out, how do you get rid of that stress?

     go for a walk and do some simple repeating vocal patterns. i never did this before but i started doing it a few months ago and it really works. it is good for multiple reasons

10.21.18  7:55 pm   what do you have to say about a person who isn't particularly creative and doesn't care to be

     you didn't quite tell me who they are, you only told me who they are not. so it's hard to know who we are talking about here

10.21.18  7:52 pm   how did you teach yourself music?

     it seems like it taught itself to me. i have experimented a huge amount on my own, and been learning things for my entire life. and as far as notation and terminology, i picked up on it very easily from a very young age, and made quick and accurate assumptions easily, and any time anyone told me any information it always stuck, and usually led to me discovering other related things correctly. i don't know why it has come so easily for me

10.21.18  7:39 pm   I'm editing a recording and there's a little blip in the audio where I edited 2 takes together and I am having trouble isolating it and fixing it, do you have any advice? 

     a crossfade would do the trick, almost every program lets you easily put a crossfade between regions. if that doesn't fix it then there is something else at play here and i would need more specifics

10.21.18  7:24 pm   how is the bridge to "do the thing" so damn strong...

     i don't know but you are very kind

10.21.18  7:10 pm   hey bill. are you completely self-educated in the field of music

      about 94%

10.21.18  7:09 pm   hey bill, do you ever play videogames?

     the one i'm playing now is the one where i take a video project that would normally take me at least 8 to 10 weeks minimum to complete, and do the exact same project in 2 weeks instead. and then repeat the process over and over again until the world expires from extinction

10.21.18  6:37 pm   Is it potayto or potahto

     potato

10.21.18  6:28 pm   preferred book or series?

     those pamphlets telling us who the bad guys are supposed to be

10.21.18  5:59 pm   what suggestions do you have for someone who aspires to make music

     i'm not sure ...... but at least try it

10.21.18  5:53 pm   have you had any professional training to get your voice as good as it is now?

     no but that could have been useful

10.21.18  5:48 pm   What brings you most joy in life?

     happiness

10.21.18  5:47 pm   how do you come up with all these ideas?

     it is raining ideas. just put out a bucket

10.21.18  4:13 pm   do not sell out and go on big mainstream youtube "shows", they just want content to please their sponsors. Keep doing what you're doing!

     i am considering doing h3, would you say that is one of the ones i should do or shouldn't do?

10.21.18  4:13 pm   How does one find time and motivation to create and fluidly express, despite their day-to-day workload and conflict internally and externally?

     you can do it in any amount of time. in shorter amounts of time, actually, it may be simpler in some ways

10.21.18  3:38 pm   in i'm gonna write a song on the count of 3, what is the meaning of the lines "but how much do those folks get paid to say what they're seeing is a mystery"?

     probably about those unsolved mysteries tv shows

     is the mystery how much they're getting paid or what they're seeing?

     what they're seeing

10.21.18  3:18 pm   hello. i've been thinking... would you assume that a perceptual existence is essentially terrible if that existence can inflict something perceptually terrible?

     only at the times when it does
